name: assignment_created
definition: The event is emitted anytime a new assignment is created by an end user or API request.
trigger: Triggered when a new assignment is created in a course.

schema.assignment_group_id: The Canvas id of the assignment group.
schema.assignment_id: The Canvas id of the new assignment.
schema.context_id: The type of context the assignment is used in.
schema.context_type: The type of context the assignment is used in.
schema.context_uuid: The uuid of the context associated with the assignment.
schema.description: The description of the assignment. NOTE: This field will be truncated to only include the first 8192 characters.
schema.due_at: The due date for the assignment.
schema.lock_at: The lock date (assignment is locked after this date).
schema.lti_assignment_id: The LTI assignment guid for the assignment.
schema.lti_resource_link_id: The unique identifier of the assignment resource in the LTI specification
schema.lti_resource_link_id_duplicated_from: The LTI resource link ID of the original assignment .
schema.points_possible: The maximum points possible for the assignment.
schema.submission_types: Valid methods for submitting the assignment, may include multiple comma separated options of: discussion_topic, external_tool, media_recording, none, not_graded, online_quiz, online_text_entry, online_upload, online_url, on_paper.
schema.title: The title of the assignment. NOTE: This field will be truncated to only include the first 8192 characters.
schema.unlock_at: The unlock date (assignment is unlocked after this date).
schema.updated_at: The time at which this assignment was last modified in any way.
schema.workflow_state: Workflow state of the assignment. E.g duplicating, fail_to_import, failed_to_duplicate, published, unpublished. See API documentation for more details.
